name: Non-Verbal
ability: Communicating without real words. Gestures, noises, and pointing (and names when online) all count as non-verbal.

name: Am I Man or Muppet?
ability: If a Townsfolk is turned into a Human they are not told of the change. If a Human is turned into a Townsfolk they are not told and become the Townsfolk they believe themselves to be.

name: Bunsen Honeydew
ability: You start knowing how many characters there are in play who can create humans.

name: Rowlf the Dog
ability: You start knowing 2 players who are not townsfolk.
firstNightReminder: Point to two players who are not townsfolk

name: Pepe the Prawn
ability: You start knowing which demon is in play.

name: Sam the Eagle
ability: Each night you learn how many steps a living evil is from you. [+1 Human]

name: Kermit the Frog
ability: Each night*, choose a player (not yourself): if they are a human they become a townsfolk.
otherNightReminder: If Kermit selected a human, remove the human reminder token. If Miss Piggy is in play instead add a human reminder token

name: Camilla the Chicken
ability: Each night*, if a player died by execution today: you learn a player of their alignment.

name: Sweetums
ability: Each night*, you learn how many evil players voted.

name: Swedish Chef
ability: Each night*, you learn if there are more or less humans than last night. If you were non-verbal on the 1st day, you instead learn how many humans are in play.
otherNightReminder: Give a finger signal (up, down, or number)

name: The Great Gonzo
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player: if you choose a minion they die, if you choose a townsfolk you die.

name: Rizzo the Rat
ability: Each night*, choose a player: if they are killed by the demon tonight, you learn an alive character.
otherNightReminder: Rizzo chooses a player. Wake them again if that player dies tonight.

name: Fozzie Bear
ability: Each day, you may make a public joke. Waka waka. Tonight, you learn if it was true.
otherNightReminder: Nod if a *True* reminder was placed today.

name: Dr. Teeth
ability: If you are killed by the demon, a human becomes a townsfolk, you learn who.
otherNightReminder: If Dr. Teeth was killed by the demon tonight, remove the human reminder token from a player, show them the player.

name: Beaker
ability: If you were non-verbal on the 1st day, that night you learn the characters of players who were nonverbal (up to 4) +1 character which is not in play.

name: Long John Silver
ability: Each night*, one player who voted on you that day might die, even if you are dead.

name: Scrooge
ability: At night, if a player chooses another player, they might target you instead.

name: Cameraman
ability: If you commmunicate verbally on the 1st day, a townsfolk might become Human immediately.

name: Human
ability: You do not know you are a Human. You think you are a Townsfolk character, but you are not.
otherNightReminder: Treat them as if they were the character they think they are, but human.

name: Crazy Harry
ability: Each night*, choose a player, the first outsider you choose becomes evil. [+1 outsider]

name: Scooter
ability: Once per day you may choose to take one player off the block. If just 3 players live you lose this ability.

name: Constantine
ability: Each night* you may choose 2 players (not the demon), they swap characters, abilities do not refresh. You might register as good, and as Kermit, even if dead.
otherNightReminder: Constanine selects two players (not the demon).

name: Animal
ability: Once per game at night*, choose a player: they die, if you were nonverbal on the 1st day, 1 of their Townsfolk neighbours becomes Human.
otherNightReminder: Does Animal want to use it? If yes, Animal chooses a player.

name: Miss Piggy
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk chosen by Kermit the Frog might become Humans instead. [+ Kermit the Frog]

name: Uncle Deadly
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Townsfolk who nominate you become Human.

name: Statler
ability: Each night*, wake with Waldorf, together choose one player: they die.[+ Waldorf, -1 minion]
otherNightReminder: Wake with Waldorf: choose a player.

name: Waldorf
ability: Each night*, wake with Statler, together choose one player: they die.[+ Statler]
otherNightReminder: Wake with Statler: choose a player.
